title: #54: More of the Killing Bayous and Capturing a Killer
description:
The Real Crime Profile team of Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti return to the case of the men brutally killed by a serial killer in Louisiana between 1997 and 2006 and how the killer was caught. 

#HisNameWasMichael #HisNameWasDatrell #HisNameWasAugust #HisNameWasNicholas #HisNameWasKurt
#HisNameWasWayne #HisNameWasChris #HisNameWasBruce #HisNameWasChristopher
